mapper.insert: insert into story (s_id, m_id, s_img, s_type) values('ST'||TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'RRMMDD')||LPAD(s_seq.NEXTVAL,3,'0'),#{my_name}, #{s_img}, 'G')
mapper.select: select m_usage from member where m_id=#{m_id}
select m_id , s_img, s_id from story where m_id=#{m_id}

select listagg(m_id,'|') within group (order by s_date desc) as m_id, s_type from (select max(s_date) as s_date, m_id, s_type from story join follow on m_id = m_id2 where m_id1=#{m_id} and s_type='G' and s_date > SYSDATE - 1 group by m_id, s_type) group by s_type

select listagg(m_id,'|') within group (order by s_date desc) as m_id, s_type from (select max(s_date) as s_date, m_id, s_type from story join follow on m_id = m_id2 and s_type='A' group by m_id, s_type) group by s_type
select m_id, s_img from story where m_id=#{id} and s_date > SYSDATE - 1
select h_name, listagg(s_id, ',') within group (order by s_id) as s_id, listagg(h_img, ',')within group (order by s_id) as h_img from highlight where m_id=#{my_name} group by h_name
mapper.delete: delete from highlight where h_name=#{h_name} and m_id = #{my_name}
delete from highlight where s_id=#{s_id} and m_id = #{my_name}
mapper.select: select h_name, s_id, m_id, h_img from highlight where h_name=#{h_name} and m_id=#{m_id}
